price: Ва падарамро биёмурз, [ки] бе тардид, дар зумраи гумроҳон буд
arabic: وَٱغۡفِرۡ لِأَبِيٓ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلضَّآلِّينَ

version.title: Tajik translation - Arfy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tajik by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-igh'fir li-abī innahu kāna mina al-ḍālīna
